lines.text: Now it is Beau's go with Caduceus on deck. What you got?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, just enraged by hearing my girlfriend let out a blood-curdling scream--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're doing PDA, it's like a thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's advantage and a d4 right now?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Probably shouldn't do reckless when you're standing in front of the creature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 24 plus a d4. 25 for the first hit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and do the second hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fine. Just make sure you hit him is the important part.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 14 damage on the first one. Eight damage on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Before we do that, could you roll a wisdom saving throw for me, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's very little chance you don't make this because of all these stacking--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, right? That is a natural 19, though, for 28, plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Two more strikes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First one is a natural 16, so that hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second one is a 10 for a 22, plus a d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Damage two more times.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, ooh, ooh, 14 damage and 15 damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can I shuffle around towards the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Towards where Yasha and Veth are and start making--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you have plenty of movement, so you can definitely do that without a major issue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, and just making sure that the bulette creature gets a turn at-- not when Edward Scissorhands goes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it did not roll high initiative.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have anything that can actually hurt it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I don't have anything to hurt this thing with.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to peek around the corner to see and back up against the wall to see what the hell Jester's dealing with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You turn around, you see Jester stepping back as this giant flesh-armored tongue creature is now (snarling) towards her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. The range on that is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that is a what save?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know how long I can hold this, so let's get out of here real soon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, let's kill this other thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, now that the dangerous puppy dog is gone, I'll use Relentless Hex to teleport 30 feet to the target of my Hexblade's Curse, putting me right up on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I need to make a wisdom thing, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You-- no, it's if you're within a range at the start of your turn, so you teleport in, you're fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. And I will see and swing away on this thing with two strikes from the Star Razor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I get advantage because it's being flanked by a bunch of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage because of Yasha's yell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That also hits. Yeah, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering and clapping)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll reach over and see Yasha all fucked up on one hand, and I'll just cut it off at the wrist and then I'll flip the blade back so it's pointing towards my elbow and I'll stick it in its navel and then just ride it up the middle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (snarls) It just spreads its innards outward, Beau, you would be in the splash zone, but you're a crazy monk and just sidestep it (splashing) as it goes across the dirt, rock in bits before it (slurps) slumps onto the ground, sliding into the rocks, pushing them aside as its body comes to rest at the bottom of the platform.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will use the rest of my movement to run around this way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just in case puppy dog comes back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're rushing around, blade in hand. (panting)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to go rejuvenate or are we going to get the fuck out of here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't hold this very long.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, do you want to check that rug real quick?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's on the map for a reason! It's there for a reason! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We stand on it and do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I-- we're going to have another creature unless--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Essek, grab that bitch! Who is that all the way in the back?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just throw it off the side and we'll see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. With that Banishment held, you all gather and begin to rush back into the hall where you first arrived?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there a way to shut this door or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There does not appear to be any sort of door there; it's just an open hallway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a drop? Have we seen how far the drop is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the next floor, you have not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got to go to nine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many-- How many can we Feather Fall and how many can we--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Feather Fall close to the edge and just go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (nervous laughter) Well, I can do five, I think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your spell slots are more important than my spell slots.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he can float, so we're good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One, two, three, four, five. We're good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't fly out far. It's straight down!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're good, we're good, we're good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, mind you, as part of Feather Fall, you still fall at the angle that you're going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just stepped off so that I would go down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The path just continues and there is a platform beneath you at--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys just go straight to nine?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I zip past Essek and just showboat just a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So they're falling all the way to nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essek casts Fly himself and begins to showboat as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go over to Veth, and I'm like (whooshing).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, Fjord, and Essek, just (whooshing) flying around the slowly falling, uncontrolled mass of the rest of the Mighty Nein.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little water ballet. Don't mind us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where we're going to end tonight's episode.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What, we haven't even hit ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to deal with that at the beginning of next session.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Banishment worked! I'm so glad I loaded that shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that the ones with the hand could--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you did it to the doggy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It also would've meant that I had to drop Bane to do it, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you tell us why Fjord was so lucky?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, we'll just say that the creature that got Banished has an ability that if peop-- creatures within 60 feet of it can't teleport.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) And he was just out of 60 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, it was a perfect chain of events to fuck that up, and I was like, "Ah!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So was a it a teleport dampener, kind of?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd like to think that creature--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want it to be like, where the fuck is these people? Where the hell am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, we'll pick up there next time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see you next week, but we love you very much and is it Thursday yet? Good night.
